name: Ox

trait.name: Charge
text: If the ox moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage.

trait.name: Beast of Burden
text: The oxen is considered to be a Huge animal for the purposes of determining its carrying capacity.

action.name: Gore
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

description:
An ox is mainly used for draft work rather than meat or milk.
Source: Volo's Guide to Monsters p. 208, Princes of the Apocalypse
